title: Where can I find purchase history with the new client?
body:
Looking for purchase history, or even a history for your hextech crafting.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Not a problem, got a screen shot showing where it is right here for you. Please excuse our professional font choice btw... ;)

http://i.imgur.com/HvDuq76.png

Let me know if there's anything else I can help out with!
when i open the purchase history i cant see anything. its just a black screen. i would like to refund a champion. i cant.
